Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ngaphandle koko uAllâh Athande (ukuba ukulibale). Inene Yena Uyakwazi okubonakalayo nokungabonakaliyo
Siya kukwenzela lula indlela yakho ukuze kube lula (ukushumayela i-Islam)
Ngoko ke nika isilumkiso eluntwini kuba isilumkiso siluncedo
Yena lowo uya kungeniswa kuMlilokazi omkhulu
(Ohlala)	ekhumbula	igama	leNkosi	yakhe	athandaze nokuthandaza
Kodwa nina nikhetha ubomi beli hlabathi
Nangona uBomi Obuzayo ibobona bulungileyo bungenaso nasiphelo
Ingaba iindaba zesiganeko (esikhulu) zifikile na kuwe
Ubuso babanye ngaloo Mini buya kudangala, (budane)
Besebenze nzima, bediniwe. (ngenxa yokuzinikela kunqulo zithixo)
Akuyi kubakho kutya kwabo (apho) ngaphandle kwe- ‘Dhari’1 ekrakra
Ubuso babanye ngaloo Mini buya kuchulumanca
Apho bangayi kuphinda beve ntetho inabungozi nabudenge
Abaziqwalaseli na iinkamela ukuba zidalwe kanjani
Yena uAllâh Uya kumohlwaya ngesohlwayo esikhulu
Inene kuThi kulapho baza kubuyela khona
Kananjalo inene kukuThi apho baza kuphendula khona
Ingaba kwezi (zifungo) zingentla apha akukho bungqina baneleyo na kubantu abanengqiqo (ukuba bashenxe kuzo zonke iintlobo zezono)
Awubonanga na (Muhammad) ukuba iNkosi yakho Yenza njani na ngabantu bakwa’Ad
Ekungazanga kuphinde kudalwe abafana nabo ezweni
Kanti namaThamûd ayeqhekeza amatye entlanjeni (akhe imizi yawo)
Ngoko ke iNkosi yakho yathulula phezu kwabo iintlobo ngeentlobo zezohlwayo ezibuhlungu
Ke kaloku umntu, Ithi iNkosi yakhe Isakumvavanya ngokumnika intlonipheko nendyebo, asuke athi: (ngokuzigwagwisa): “INkosi yam Indinike intlonipheko.”
Kodwa Ithi Yakumvavanya ngokuthi Imnciphisele isixhaso sakhe, (aqale) athi: “INkosi yam Indincitshile.”
Yaye nidla amafa abo onke ngokunyoluka
